sentences.english: Old Mrs. Yu woke up. She was confused by this weird dream.
sentences.chinese: 余老夫人醒过来，难解这个希罕的梦。

sentences.english: Not rare comfortable soft spring bed.
sentences.chinese: 不希罕舒服柔软的钢丝床。

sentences.english: A stone so rare men will do anything to possess it.
sentences.chinese: 一块希罕的石头人们不惜一切代价将其据为己有。

sentences.english: Thestrange mechanical device is the prototype of modern cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个希罕的机械安置是现代汽车的原型。

sentences.english: Maybe I don't need your money.
The most surprising rencounter was at the entrance to the Grand Sewer.
sentences.chinese: 最希罕的发现是在大阴渠的进口处。

sentences.english: Not rare rare comfortable soft of steel wire bed.
sentences.chinese: 不希罕舒服柔软的钢丝床。

sentences.english: It's only a whimsical story for children.
sentences.chinese: 这不过是一个希罕古怪的儿童故事。

sentences.english: She has many men wanting her for her constant changes is the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 她有许多男人希罕，因为她持续的变化可谓挑战。

sentences.english: A person who practiced that rare skill is called an Occlumens.
sentences.chinese: 一个熟练操纵这种希罕的技术的人叫做大脑封闭术师。

sentences.english: What those people valued was high wages.
sentences.chinese: 这些人所希罕的就是高工钱。

sentences.english: High school graduation was a rare achievement prior to World War II.
sentences.chinese: 二战之前，高中毕业是希罕的成就。

sentences.english: I don't care much for these european potatoes .
sentences.chinese: 我不希罕这些欧洲的马铃薯。

definition: rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
incorrect variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]
variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
(of a widow) faithful to the death to her husband's memory
see 嗤之以鼻[chi1 zhi1 yi3 bi2]
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
fail to appreciate sb's kindness/not know how to appreciate favors
